I could honestly care less if it turns at least somewhat more realistic later on in that they fight or some shit because we all know damn well who would win anyways. I'd say fuck this author in particular for getting my hopes up but I can't imagine a bigger fuck you than getting your stuff free tl'd. Love this guy's art but I'd rather just scroll through textless pages than be reminded of my spite for the inevitable sequels.
